summary: Comprehensive testing of Walt the GOAT fitness app - New exercise database features. Backend 100% (18/18 tests), Frontend 100% working. Fixed bug in plan generation with null dolori_articolari. All new features verified: 26 exercises in 7 categories, Smart Swap, exercise info modal, GPS tracking with movement filter.

fixed_bugs.issue: TypeError when dolori_articolari is None - 'argument of type NoneType is not iterable'
fixed_bugs.fix: Changed line 330 in server.py: dolori = inputs.dolori_articolari if inputs and inputs.dolori_articolari else []

backend_issues.notes: All 18 backend API tests passing. Exercise database seeded with 26 exercises in 7 categories. Smart Swap alternatives correctly filter by category.

frontend_issues.notes: All frontend features working correctly. Login page shows Walt PNG logo. CircuitPage shows exercise categories, Sostituisci and Info buttons. WalkPage has GPS tracking with movement filter.

passed_tests: Backend: Health endpoint returns 'Walt the GOAT'
Backend: GET /api/exercises returns 26 exercises
Backend: GET /api/exercises?categoria=Gambe returns 5 exercises
Backend: GET /api/exercises/categories returns 7 categories
Backend: GET /api/exercises/{id} returns exercise details with varianti, note_sicurezza
Backend: GET /api/exercises/{id}/alternatives returns same-category alternatives
Backend: GET /api/elastici returns 5 color-kg mappings
Backend: POST /api/plans/generate creates plan
Backend: POST /api/plans/generate with energia adjusts walk duration
Backend: POST /api/plans/generate with focus_muscolare filters exercises
Backend: POST /api/plans/generate with dolori_articolari excludes exercises
Backend: Auth required for all exercise endpoints
Frontend: Login page shows Walt PNG logo
Frontend: Home page loads with authentication
Frontend: CircuitPage shows exercise category in yellow
Frontend: CircuitPage has Sostituisci button that opens Smart Swap modal
Frontend: Smart Swap modal shows 4 same-category alternatives
Frontend: CircuitPage has Info button that opens exercise details modal
Frontend: Info modal shows Esecuzione, Muscoli target, Attrezzi, Sicurezza, Varianti
Frontend: WalkPage shows timer, distance, speed, steps, calories
Frontend: WalkPage has GPS tracking with movement filter (>5m, 0.5-15 km/h)
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed: server.py line 330 - dolori_articolari null check was missing, causing 500 errors
seed_data_creation: Cleared old exercises collection to trigger re-seeding with new 26 exercises from exercises_database.py
context_for_next_testing_agent: Exercise database now has 26 exercises in 7 categories (Gambe, Core, Braccia, Spalle, Petto, Schiena, Cardio). Test session token: test_session_walt_1771011315941. All APIs require Bearer token authentication. Smart Swap correctly returns same-category alternatives.
rca_of_the_issue: Bug in /api/plans/generate: When inputs object was provided but dolori_articolari was None (not specified), the code tried to check 'if ginocchia in dolori' which failed with TypeError. Fixed by adding null check: dolori = inputs.dolori_articolari if inputs and inputs.dolori_articolari else []
